document.full_text: carey price produced 34 saves to spur montreal to a 3-1 win over the boston bruins on saturday and put the canadiens 2-0 up in the eastern conference series.
document.title: boston "priced" out as canadiens take 2-0 lead
lines_and_colors: carey price produced 34 saves to spur montreal to a 3-1 win over the boston bruins on saturday and put the canadiens 2-0 up in the eastern conference series.
